attributes.action: lower the tax on road legal quad bikes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
quad bike tax should be lower.
They are better for the environment so why should we have to pay the same ammount as a lot of cars which are bad for the environment.
£115 is too much when a bike as big as a 1000cc only pays £64.
needs to be changed to encourage drivers to use better vehicles for the environment.
